title: A24 inks new TV deal
summary: A24 and Lionsgate have entered into a new television co-production agreement The deal aims to leverage both companies' strengths in content creation and distribution This partnership is expected to expand A24's footprint in the television market
bullet_points: A24 and Lionsgate have entered into a new television co-production agreement
The deal aims to leverage both companies' strengths in content creation and distribution
This partnership is expected to expand A24's footprint in the television market
Lionsgate will collaborate with A24 on developing and producing new TV projects
The agreement signals a strategic move by A24 to scale its television production capabilities
Both companies anticipate the deal will enhance their competitive positioning in the entertainment industry
classification_notes: Content, Deals & Distribution -> TV -> General News & Strategy
